item.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
item.description: Fanil Sarvarov was the head of the armed forces' operational training department, Russia's Investigative Committee said.

item.title: Bondi gunmen 'meticulously' planned attack for months, police allege
item.description: Police release a tranche of documents allegedly tracing the suspects' movements prior to the deadly shooting.

item.title: Thailand, Cambodia agree to talks in bid to end deadly conflict - minister
item.description: At least 41 people have been killed and nearly one million others displaced on both sides, officials said.

item.title: Israel approves 19 new settlements in occupied West Bank
item.description: Far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said the move was about blocking the establishment of a Palestinian state.

item.title: All pupils kidnapped from Nigeria Catholic school now free - officials
item.description: The authorities confirm the remaining students abducted in Niger state last month have been released.
